messages.title: MESSAGE TO THE RESIDENTS OF SITTINGBOURNE
messages.content: This is a General Election that nobody really wanted, including me, but which I believe is necessary to break the impasse in a zombie Parliament that has consistently refused to allow the Government to govern or deliver the Brexit for which 17.4 million people voted almost three and a half years ago.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supports the Brexit agreement and Political Declaration Boris Johnson negotiated with the EU, and believes it protects jobs and livelihoods of citizens.

mentions.candidate: I believe I am that person.

issues.brexitEurope: Supports the Brexit agreement and Political Declaration Boris Johnson negotiated with the EU.
issues.education: Working on a solution to challenges partly by the lack of choice in secondary education on Sheppey.
issues.governance: Mentions difficulties with the current Parliament and the need for functional governance.

leaflet.personalStatement: That person needs to be somebody who understands the challenges facing Sittingbourne; they need to have a proven record of standing up for our area; and they need to be somebody you can trust to keep their word. I believe I am that person.

politicalExperience.achievements: Stood up for local communities, first as a Swale borough councillor, then as a Kent county councillor, and, since 2010, as your Member of Parliament.

images.caption: Gordon Henderson with the text 'General Election - 12th December 2019' and 'MESSAGE TO THE RESIDENTS OF SITTINGBOURNE.'
